description:
Holger Wille - a Phantom Filmschool 1 graduate

"Last night I finished Filmschool 1. This morning I flew the first tests. Absolutely great!!! The school really helps a lot to understand how to get along with Litchi and how to produce excellent results. Litchi makes out of the Phantom/Inspire a complete different drone. Great app!!!"

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Would you like to be able to shoot pro cinematic footage with your Phantom or Inspire? 

You can learn everything there is to know  about doing this on the Litchi app if you take the Phantom Filmschool courses.

There are 3 Phantom Filmschool courses each dealing with different aspects of aerial photography and filmmaker.

 This is a sample course to give you an idea of what the Phantom Filmschool 1 course is like so you can see for yourself if you are keen to take the course and become a pro!
title: Phantom Filmschool sample course
